data.message: I could not tell what was done but need to use this.

replies.message: Hey Elizabeth. You can unfollow someone in just a few steps. Learn how: http://on.fb.me/1KINBUI. Hope this does the trick! -Kate
When I check unfollow it goes right back to default. Tried this numerous times and so has my husband. Keep jumping back to default on their profile.
How do I createvavpagevfir my high school alumni association without it having my name showing on the profile. Is there a way to do this?

Hi there, Elizabeth. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. Please help us keep track of this by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1My86Lg. To answer your second question, you can create a Page for your organization without showing your name. You can learn more about what Page names are accepted on Facebook here: http://on.fb.me/1My846h. Hope this helps! -Kate
I don't get rid of this person

I created a page for that group but I had to use my name and could not figure out how to create it so my name would not show, I wanted the alumni associations name to show on the page with the profile of our school. Never could figure it out. Now i have a second page with my name but I have not used it. Do I delete and start over?

Ok Kate I had already read that but it does not give me what i need. I tried using the alumni name when i created it, would not allow said I had to use a real name! Help! Where do I put the name of my school 's alumni association when I create the page! Never found the answer.

I just saw the page for the young and the restless. Someone had to create it. How did that title get on the page and not the persons name who created it? This is what i need to know, how to create such a page and i be the administrator.
